div.p: This code system https://fhir.ehealth-systems.at/artifacts/PlanDefinition/tag provides a fragment that includes following code:

tr.td: A default treatment plan, that should be preselected and eventually applied when registering new patients.

title.value: KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan Code System

description.value: Meta data tags of standard treatment plans.

definition.value: A default treatment plan, that should be preselected and eventually applied when registering new patients.
